name: Movie Games
summary:
Now everyone is a movie star! With Movie Games, your family can create scenes from movies and enjoy fun multiplayer mini-games. Players can act out scenes from the movies alone or with up to four partiers!

Act out scenes from the movies! Play a part in 20 different scenes, each with its own story line and mini-game.
Multiplayer fun for the whole family! Up to 4 players can play simultaneously, ensuring a party erupts from your living room.
Scenes take place within 5 unique movie studios! Including Spy Base, Pirate Ship, Haunted House, Inca Temple and Outer Space.
First Wii game based entirely in movie studios!
Choose your avatar from among 8 different actors.
